## Introduction

The link above contains the lecture slides for three sessions on the theme "Historical Persistence" for the Applied Economics Research Course, a 3rd year BSc-level course. The lectures are as follows:

- Lecture 1: Historical Persistence and an Introduction to Geospatial Data
- Lecture 2: Manipulating and Aggregating Vector and Raster Data
- Lecture 3: Geographic Regression Discontinuity Designs
- Lecture 4: Additional Data Wrangling
- Example Presentation
